cavein: well, if you're here, could you help out?

I need you to get some bombs.
This cave collapsed, and nobody can get in.
teachwall:
if only I had a grapple hook... 
 press space

click with the mouse to shoot it. 
once it's grappled something you can pull your self with w or
 lower yourself with s

to get up there you will have to use it 
 in a clever way.
try climbing by shooting farther up while jumping.
